data.name: King of Queendoms 18+ Adults Only Patch
data.detailed_description: For those who want to experience King of Queendoms in its full adults only glory. This DLC adds the adults only content to the game.
data.about_the_game: For those who want to experience King of Queendoms in its full adults only glory. This DLC adds the adults only content to the game.
data.short_description: For those who want to experience King of Queendoms in its full adults only glory. This DLC adds the adults only content to the game.
data.supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, German, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista or higher
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Vista or higher
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
King of Queendoms involves the main character romancing women with the goal of a sexual encounter. It includes sexual themes and depictions featuring undressing, nudity and sexual interactions. Depictions are consensual between all parties. Elements of Femdom.

Graphic depictions of vaginal sex, fellatio and foreplay.
